h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: Continue on the main path in the Chapter and past the Father of Stones mini-boss. Open the door and go past the statue, along the bridge, and into the cave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_5_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Defeat Gray-Bronze Cart'.
The content is as follows:
Continue on the main path in the Chapter and past the Father of Stones mini-boss. Open the door and go past the statue, along the bridge, and into the cave.
